name: Lucas Bateson
about: I am a software developer specializing in both front-end and back-end development. I have a passion for writing reliable, maintainable, and well-documented code that solves real-world problems.

I enjoy working with modern frameworks and technologies, constantly exploring new tools to enhance my skill set. I believe in the importance of staying updated with the latest industry trends while maintaining a strong foundation in programming fundamentals.

experience.summary: Two-year internship at the Norwegian Labour and Welfare Administration working across the stack.
Began with a 3‑week work placement, then worked every Wednesday.
One‑week internship doing data analysis for the InSchool service in Amazon QuickSight.
One‑week internship learning their systems and doing OpenAI API tasks; also worked with Azure permissions and handled support cases.
One‑week internship developing a frontend invoicing solution in Vue.js.
Taught block programming to grade 4 students.
